title: REQUEST: Import .moba files, from MobaXTerm
author: Apollon-Theos
body_snippet:
v 1.76 and 1.77.2 cannot import *.moba files, saved from MobaXTerm. 
But MobaXTerm can import config file from mRemoteNG :)

## Expected Behavior
Can import *.moba files, for one connection. And *.mtxsessions for folder with multiple connections.

## Current Behavior
This files not exist in filter list for import files. With verify that is RDP or HTTP sessions.

## Possible Solution


## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
No import :(

## Your Environment
* Version used: 1.76 every wo...

comments.snippet:
If you are interested, I have developed a PowerShell script to perform this conversion.
It may not be perfect, but it allowed me to convert 245 MobaXterm sessions to mRemoteNG.

Here is the link to download it: 
https://github.com/JustBeta/Export-MobaXtern2mRemoteNG/tree/main
comments.author: JustBeta
